articles.author: Naman Agarwal
articles.title: South Africa squad update: Injured Gerald Coetzee to miss second Test | SA vs IND - Wisden
articles.description: Gerald Coetzee has been ruled out of the second SA vs IND Test in Cape Town due to an injury. Click here for details.
articles.content:
Fast bowler Gerald Coetzee has been ruled out of the second SA vs IND Test scheduled to start on January 3 in Cape Town due to an injury.

articles.title: What ails Gill's batting in Test cricket... - Rediff.com
articles.description: He has scored 994 runs in 35 innings at an average of 31.06. However, his statistics suggest his struggle against red-ball giants like New Zealand, England and now South Africa.

articles.title: South Africa launches case at top UN court accusing Israel of genocide in Gaza - The Associated Press
articles.description: South Africa has launched a case at the United Nations’ top court accusing Israel of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza and asking the court to order Israel to halt its attacks. It's the first such challenge made at the court over the current war. Israel s…
